name: athletic_career
requirements: Execute ONLY the explicitly requested state modifications. Use exact values as specified: numbers as integers/floats (not strings), strings in quotes. For stats dict, use ONLY the key names from the Variable description - never invent new keys. When setting boolean-like values, use integers (1 for true, 0 for false) unless explicitly told otherwise. Do not add unrequested keys or modify unrequested variables.

turns.query: Beginning my athletic journey! I'm Jordan Swift, amateur sprinter at level 1. Score is 0, actively training. Log 'started_training'. Starting with 0 events and 0 medals.
Entered my first local competition! 1 event completed, personal best time of 10.5 seconds. Level up, add 25 points. Log 'first_competition'.
Won my first medal! 2 more events (total 3), 1 medal earned, PB improved to 10.3. Level up, add 50 points. Log 'first_medal'.
Joined Coach Smith's elite training program! Training 20 hours per week now. Move to semi_pro phase. Level up, add 75 points. Log 'elite_training'.
Regional champion! 3 more events (total 6), 2 more medals (total 3), PB now 10.1. Level up, add 100 points. Log 'regional_champ'.
Signed my first sponsorship deal! 1 sponsor, $10,000 in earnings. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'first_sponsor'.
Selected for the national team! 5 more events (total 11), 3 more medals (total 6), PB down to 9.95. Move to professional phase. Double the score! Level up. Log 'national_team'.
Bronze at Continental Championships! 3 more events (total 14), 1 more medal (total 7). Now ranked 50th in the world. Level up, add 200 points. Log 'continental_bronze'.
Qualified for World Championships! 4 more events (total 18), 2 more medals (total 9), PB improved to 9.90. Level up, add 250 points. Log 'worlds_qualified'.

Made the World Championship final! 2 more events (total 20), world ranking jumped to 15, got another sponsor (total 2), $50,000 more earnings (total $60,000). Move to elite phase. Level up, add 400 points. Log 'worlds_finalist'.
Landed a major endorsement deal! 2 more sponsors (total 4), $200,000 more earnings (total $260,000). Level up, add 300 points. Log 'major_endorsement'.
Came so close to the world record! PB now 9.82, world ranking up to 8. Level up, add 350 points. Log 'record_attempt'.
Won the Diamond League! 3 more events (total 23), 2 more medals (total 11), world ranking to 5, $100,000 more earnings (total $360,000). Double the score! Level up. Log 'diamond_league_win'.

World Championship medal! 2 more events (total 25), 1 more medal (total 12), world ranking to 3, $150,000 more earnings (total $510,000). Move to world_class phase. Level up, add 600 points. Log 'worlds_medal'.
Olympic qualifying time achieved! 3 more events (total 28), PB now 9.78. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'olympic_qualifier'.
Arrived at the Olympic Village! Set olympics to 1. Set status to 'olympian'. Level up, add 400 points. Log 'olympic_village'.
Advanced to the Olympic semifinal! 1 more event (total 29), PB down to 9.75. Level up, add 500 points. Log 'olympic_semifinal'.
I'm in the Olympic final! 1 more event (total 30), world ranking is now 2. Level up, add 800 points. Log 'olympic_final'.
OLYMPIC GOLD MEDALIST! Set medals to 13, gold to 1, earnings to 1510000. Triple the score! Level up. Log 'olympic_gold'.

I broke the world record! Rename to 'Jordan Swift [LEGEND]'. PB is now 9.58, world ranking is #1, set hall_of_fame to 1. Set status to 'legend', level up, double the score, and set active to False. Log 'world_record'.
